about_the_game:
Engine Roar is a fun old-school race for survival on rusty post-apocalyptic wastelands, under the noisy roar of engines in pixel 3D styling.

6 cars during the race to pass the championship or a fast race.



Cars with customization, different controls, body damage and explosions from damage.



More than 20 tracks with the possibility of changing day and night, a choice of different weather conditions, as well as guns and other attacking obstacles.



Cool soundtracks from The Spin Tires!
